reapy.core.track.envelope module¶

class reapy.core.track.envelope.Envelope(id)[source]¶

Bases: object

add_item(position=0.0, length=0.0, pool=0)[source]¶

Add automation item to envelope.

Parameters:
  • position (float, optional) – New item position in seconds (default=0).
  • length (float) – New item length in seconds (default=0).
  • pool (int) – New item pool index. If >= 0 the automation item will be a new instance of that pool (which will be created as an empty instance if it does not exist).
Returns:

item – New automation item.
Return type:

AutomationItem
n_items¶

Return number of automation items in envelope.

Returns:n_items – Number of automation items in envelope.
Return type:int
n_points¶

Return number of points in envelope.

Returns:n_points – Number of points in envelope.
Return type:int

reapy.core.track.track module¶

class reapy.core.track.track.Track(id, project=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

add_item()[source]¶

Create new item on track and return it.

Returns:item – New item on track.
Return type:Item
automation_mode¶

Return track automation mode.

Returns:automation_mode –
One of the following values:
”latch” “latch preview” “read” “touch” “trim/read” “write”
Return type:str
color¶

Return track color in RGB format.

Returns:
  • r (int) – Red value of track color.
  • g (int) – Green value of track color.
  • b (int) – Blue value of track color.
delete()[source]¶

Delete track.

depth¶

Return track depth.

Returns:depth – Track depth.
Return type:int
get_envelope(index=None, name=None, chunk_name=None)[source]¶

Return track envelope for a given index, name or chunk name.

Parameters:
  • index (int, optional) – Envelope index.
  • name (str, optional) – Envelope name.
  • chunk_name (str, optional) – Built-in envelope configuration chunk name, e.g. “<VOLENV”.
Returns:

envelope – Track envelope.
Return type:

Envelope
is_selected¶

Return whether track is selected.

Returns:is_selected – Whether track is selected.
Return type:bool
items¶

Return list of items on track.

Returns:items – List of items on track.
Return type:list of Item
n_items¶

Return number of items on track.

Returns:n_items – Number of items on track.
Return type:int
name¶

Return track name.

Returns:name – Track name (“MASTER” for master track, “Track N” if track has no name).
Return type:str
